ARION-SDB.ST.summary: Arion banki hf. provides various financial services to households, corporates, and investors in Iceland and internationally. It operates through three segments: Retail Banking, Corporate & Investment Banking, and Markets. The Retail Banking segment offers a range of products and services, including mortgage loans, savings and current accounts, vehicle and equipment financing, factoring, payment cards, pension services, and insurance and funds to individuals and SMEs through a network of 19 branches with approximately 100,000 customers. The Corporate & Investment Banking segment provides a range of lending products, such as guarantees, deposit accounts, payment solutions, and value-added digital solutions to large and medium-sized corporate clients and investors; international transactions; and various financial advisory and capital raising services, including M&A and LBO services, as well as financial structuring advice, and services on public offerings of securities. The Markets segment manages financial assets on behalf of its customers, as well as a range of mutual, investment, and institutional investor funds; administers pension funds; and provides various fixed income services and risk management products. The company also offers liquidity, currency, and interest rate management services, as well as handles various debt issuance in the domestic and foreign markets, and maintaining its credit ratings; provides non-life and life insurance; and invests in properties. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in ReykjavÃ­k, Iceland.

KVIKA.IC.summary: Kvika banki hf., a specialized bank, provides investment banking, asset management, and selected banking services in Iceland and the United Kingdom. It operates through five segments: Corporate Banking, Corporate Finance, Capital Markets, Proprietary Trading and Treasury, and Asset Management. The Corporate Banking segment offers various banking services and related advisory services, as well as lending services. The Corporate Finance segment provides advisory service, such as acquisitions, divestments and mergers, financing and financial restructuring, listings of stock and bonds, and strategic reviews of securities and businesses. The Capital Markets segment offers securities, foreign currency, and derivatives brokerage services; and forward contracts to the institutional investors, corporates, and individuals. The Proprietary Trading and Treasury segment provides market making and treasury services. The Asset Management segment offers domestic and foreign assets, private banking, and private pension plans. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Reykjavik, Iceland.

SJOVA.IC.summary: SjÃ³vÃ¡-Almennar tryggingar hf. operates as an insurance company in Iceland. The company offers motor vehicle, family and home, life and critical illness, and medical cost insurance products for individuals. It also provides commercial insurance products, such as fire and commercial property insurance; public and product liability, employer's liability, directors and officers liability, professional indemnity, and commercial liability insurance; operation interruption insurance; vessel crew, hull and machinery, and catch and fishing gear/tackle insurance; vessel cargo, transport cargo, and purse seine insurance; baggage, sickness and accidents on travelling, and cancelation insurance; and insurance products for employees and leaders.
